Reviews.Title: “Clean and good hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel hour ride decided public transport cheaper taxi 20 minutes schonefeld airport hotel staff efficeint freindly standard extremly clean bed comfortable aircondition adjusted individually minibar tvchannels german wish channels english languages 5 euros extra day breakfast excellent variety cold warm dishes costs 25 euros according opinion expensive food berlin cheap eat dinner couple beers 20 euros hotel pool gym free charge guests bus underground train services runs 247 taxis fairly priced

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel”
Reviews.Author: mrsmith0179
Reviews.Content: stayed nights due inhouse congress satisfied stay checkin smooth friendly professional front staff upgrade free charge quiet spotlessly clean bit dated breakfast buffet sort okish choice quality service bit sluggish overall friendly comment fitness pool facilities typical business hotel professional staff location hotel close potsdamer platz lively berlin hesitate return recommend hotel anyway

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Housebound
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights fantastically run hotel staff helpful efficient comfortable gorgeous fluffy pillows duvets bathroom gleaming dont seen bathroom cleaned standard thank housekeeping staff doing wonderful job breakfast buffet outstanding literally eat yourself death goodies eat complaint late arriving ate bar bar menu vegetarian options basic salad basically plate lettuce cost €12 apart stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel spacious maintained furnished modern staff helpful polite stayed 6 nights found comfortable clean maintained hotel quiet path embassy walk recommended planet guide berlin easy 15min walk potsdamer stations eat hotel expensive expect hotel quality recommend hotel round choice city break berlin

Reviews.Content: stayed conference taking hotel september perfect lifts busy food breakfast lunch dinner superb occasions near centre bit walk town flat bikes hotel bar relaxing

Reviews.Title: “Huge hotel, nice rooms, location okay, large pool”

Reviews.Title: “Classy and convenient”

Reviews.Content: stayed friday sunday business types hotel truly stars appearance comfortable generic quiet try service food reasonable portion service charge hardly bargain location equidistant potsdamer platz tiergarten ten minute walk probably unfortunately expect free wifi 3 hotel 4 5 spare sim card mobile internet hotels

Reviews.Title: “Good location and smart hotel”
Reviews.Author: rose-from-the-shires
Reviews.Content: spent nights lovely hotel riviera travel obviously popular business etc city holiday break ten minute walk centre easy access public transport hotel smart clean size quiet fifth floor situated lift beds soft comfortable soft bed enable nights sleep breakfast superb lots choice didnt meals hotel cant comment quality staff extremely obliging gripe tea coffee facilities unfortunately didnt time swimming pool etc facilities looked inviting overall extremely impressed

Reviews.Title: “Great location, fine hotel”

Reviews.Content: located near potsdamer platz 10 min walk easy access berlin 5 min walk berlins park location amongst embassys quiet location german efficiency abundant helpful staff nice clean bed bit soft families business travelers welcome

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week enjoyed moment quiet considering guests night breakfast astounding sorry bucks fizz price minibar acceptable considering capital city hotel riviera tours choosing

Reviews.Content: helpful staff nice little swimming pool thanks concierge recommending 12 alternative dining experience loved son loved legoland discovery centre sony centre activity raining ten minutes walk hotel fabulous breakfast buffet choice fruit meat breads definitely stay
